nodes.name: createPoll
createPoll

createPoll(string,uint256,bytes,uint16,u.details: create a poll and store the address of the poll in this contract

params._endTime: Time after which the poll no longer accepts new votes
params._ipfsHash: Multihash for IPFS file containing poll information
params._numOptions: Number of choices in this poll
params._startTime: Time after which a user can cast a vote in the poll

createPoll(string,uint256,bytes,uint16,u.return: The address of the new Poll
